p: Participants in Group A will receive the following treatment. After each insertion site be disinfected with 75% alcohol, sterile intradermal acupuncture needles (PYONEX, ϕ0.2 × 1.2 mm, SEIRIN Corporation, Japan) will be inserted vertically to a depth of 1.2 mm. Participants will be requested to put pressure on the each auricular point for about 15 seconds per one time, 3 times per day.
